name: Brick Hill: Colourization Theme
description:
This theme allows you to change Brick Hill's default grey/white colour into something better.

[TIP]: You can change the Colour in the 'Customise Settings' tab.


Join our Discord Server for new Themes, Updates, and more:
https://discord.me/-CELESTIAL
